testsuite.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function
Below test cases basic utility function cases

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases basic utility function cases S-Bash-util-0002. User adds a variable using add_pipeline_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair and the value should be of type string with spaces included. Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0002. User adds a variable using add_pipeline_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair and the value should be of type string with spaces included. Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases basic utility function cases S-Bash-util-0003. User adds a variable using add_pipeline_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair where the value is of string with spaces and if the variable is exported in powerShell step . Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0003. User adds a variable using add_pipeline_variables utility function in the Bash step for one key-value pair where the value is of string with spaces and if the variable is exported in powerShell step . Then verifies that the format of the string should be the same in the onExecute section.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases basic utility function cases S-Bash-util-0006. User adds a variable using add_pipeline_files utility function in the bash step and if the file is exported in powershell step. Then verify if the file is in the same format.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0006. User adds a variable using add_pipeline_files utility function in the bash step and if the file is exported in powershell step. Then verify if the file is in the same format.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases basic utility function cases S-Bash-util-0007. Add save_tests utility function in the Bash step where the input source empty directory and the user sees that step is success.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0007. Add save_tests utility function in the Bash step where the input source empty directory and the user sees that step is success.

testcase.class: STEP_UTILITYFUNCTIONS - Bash Step Tests For Utility Function Below test cases basic utility function cases S-Bash-util-0008. Add save_tests utility function in the Bash step where the input source empty folder and the user sees that step is success.
testcase.classclass: S-Bash-util-0008. Add save_tests utility function in the Bash step where the input source empty folder and the user sees that step is success.
